pos_mean_info_list.mean: [机] 调节器；作曲者；排字工人；安装员，从事安装的人

word_mean_info__list.difference: 一般特指戏剧或小说所写的环境或场所。
指或大或小的地方，既可指供专门用途或特定活动的地点，又可指某一事件的地址。
多指物体相对于其他物体所处的位置或状态。
指某物设置的方向或地点。
常指真实事件或虚构故事发生的地点。
指某物所处的客观位置和周围地区。
含义广泛，最普通用词，既可指很小的地点，又可指很大很远的地方或场所。
指物体在其周围环境中所处的位置或状态，侧重地点或场所的环境特征。
指相对较小的特定地点或事物所在地。

word_group.brief_definition: 默认设置；默认设定；缺省设置
目标设置；目标设定；目标设立
议程设置；议程设定；制定议程
社会背景；社会环境；社交环境
业务设置；商业设置；商业环境
医院环境；医院设置；医院配置
功率设置；动力设定；电源设置

bilingual.source: It also has a voice control setting that enables you to stay hands-free.
bilingual.target: 它还有一个语音控制设置，使你可以解放双手。

bilingual.source: They are setting up the conference room.
The radio has a tunable frequency setting.
bilingual.target: 这台收音机有一个可调的频率设置。

bilingual.source: Setting up proxies can sometimes be complicated.
bilingual.target: 设置代理服务器有时会很复杂。

bilingual.source: The brt setting is too high for a dark room.
bilingual.target: 在黑暗的房间里，亮度设置太高了。

bilingual.source: The speed ratio setting of this device is incorrect.
bilingual.target: 这个设备的速比设置不正确。

bilingual.source: You can filter spam by setting up a white list.
bilingual.target: 你可以通过设置白名单来过滤垃圾邮件。

bilingual.source: The soldier checked the fuze before setting the timer.
bilingual.target: 士兵在设置计时器之前检查了引信。

bilingual.source: Setting up a longline requires careful planning and execution.
bilingual.target: 设置长线需要仔细的计划和执行。

yingyinNormal.en: He's working with the people who are setting me up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他跟那群想要陷害我的人狼狈为奸

yingyinNormal.en: You guys aren't setting any speed records, are you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们干活都没记个时，是吧？

yingyinNormal.en: The family are setting off for George's birthday treat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 全家人一起出发去给乔治过生日。

yingyinNormal.en: I think he's setting her up. I know how to handle him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认为他要陷害她了。我知道怎样对付他。

yingyinNormal.en: How about setting me and my friends up with three or four sets each?
yingyinNormal.zh: 给我和我的朋友换一换轮胎怎么样？

yingyinNormal.en: And then, Raj, you bring the stuff across the hall and start setting up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后拉杰，你把东西搬到对面，然后开始布置。

yingyinNormal.en: You wanted to talk? An odd setting for a conversation. Here among the dead.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你找我吗？谈话的地点挺诡异的，这里死人这么多。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, I'm a chef on a Sunday afternoon setting the menu at a big restaurant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是个厨师，周日下午正在大餐馆定着菜单。

yingyinNormal.en: How come we have one extra place setting? 'Cause you invited your assistant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么多了一套餐具？你邀了你的助理过来。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm a good person. No. You're setting Peter up. I want to be left alone with my thoughts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是好人。不可能，你在给彼得下套。我想自己安静思考。

yingyinNormal.en: What you doing? I'm setting out snacks. You do realize everyone's eating at Raj's again tonight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在做什么？拿点小吃出来。今晚我们都要去拉杰家你知道的吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, I can start by setting up some meetings for both of you. I can't do that publicly, of course.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，我可以先为你俩安排一些会面。当然不能公开行动。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on you guys, I don't care, I have a date tonight. You have a date? Yeah, Monica's setting me up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我才不在乎，我今晚有约会。你有约会？对呀，莫妮卡为我安排的。

yingyinNormal.en: In such a traditional setting, I want to make historic British bread to which I've added a modern twist.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在这么个传统的环境里，我想制作有历史性的英式面包，只不过我在里面加了一点现代原料。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you see that? See what? It was a rabbit, I think. Nasty things. I do enjoy setting the dogs on them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看到了吗？什么？我想是只兔子。肮脏的东西，我应该弄只狗来的。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't believe you're dressing up for him. I mean, you're just,you're setting yourself up all over again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不相信你竟然为他打扮，你又要重蹈覆辙了。

yingyinNormal.en: But I feel obliged to mention that setting off an explosive device in a spacecraft is a terrible terrible idea.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是我觉得应该提醒一下你，在宇航飞船上引爆东西是个坏点子。

yingyinNormal.en: Alicia, what do you want as your default setting for DVDs, 5.1 Dolby or DTS? Whatever you think is best, cutie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾丽西娅，你DVD想怎么设啊，5.1杜比还是家庭影院？你看着办好了，小可爱。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, that was very kind of you. Wait until Carson has everyone in their seat before you start setting up. I will.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，真是感谢您。等到卡森把大家都安排入座，你们再去楼上准备。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: Is she single? I'm not setting her up with Raj. What about Stuart? Are you listening? I want her to think I'm not mean.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她单身吗？我才不要撮合她跟拉杰。那斯图尔特呢？你是没听我说话吗？我想要她觉得我是暖心好人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It's common to have a "cubicle mate" or special confidant in a work <highlight>setting</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在工作环境中，有一个“隔间伴侣”或特别的知己是很常见的。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 常指“背景、环境”(= surroundings or environment on stage)。
指某事或动作发生时的“情况”。
专指自然环境，从周围的事物这一客体着眼。
专指自然环境，也可指精神环境，均从环境对人的感受，道德及观念的影响着眼。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The Ebro Delta, in Spain, famous as a battleground during the Spanish Civil War, is now the <highlight>setting</highlight> for a different contest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在西班牙内战期间作为战场而闻名的西班牙埃布罗河三角洲，现在变成了另一个不同的争战之地。

sense_info_list.en: a position on the controls of a piece of equipment
the place and time at which a play, novel, or film is represented as happening

examination_example.sentence: The CGI technology allows the image of the deceased James Dean to be presented to young people in new <highlight>settings</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: CGI技术允许在新的环境中向年轻人展示已故詹姆斯·迪恩的形象。

direction_info.description:

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: Young people have reported that for low-level conditions such as stress and anxiety, a clinical <highlight>setting</highlight> can sometimes be daunting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 年轻人报告说，对于压力和焦虑等低水平的情况，临床环境有时会令人生畏。

examination_example.sentence: Every brick he cleaned on a house stood out like a red jewel in a white <highlight>setting</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在房子上清理的每一块砖都像白色背景下的红色宝石一样突出。

examination_example.sentence: As the summer months roll in, our Georgian country estate makes the perfect <highlight>setting</highlight> for an outdoor fitness session.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着夏季的到来，我们的格鲁吉亚乡村庄园为户外健身活动提供了完美的环境。

examination_example.sentence: People need permission to be funny in social <highlight>settings</highlight> because there's always a risk that comes with humor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们在社交场合搞笑需要被允许，因为幽默总是伴随着风险。

examination_example.sentence: I found myself looking at a wonderfully clear view of Skiddaw with the sun <highlight>setting</highlight> in the west.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我发现我看见了Skiddaw梦幻而清晰的景色。

examination_example.sentence: Motivation and goal <highlight>setting</highlight> are the two sides of same coin.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 动机和目标设定是同一枚硬币的两面。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 含义广泛，最普通用词，既可指很小的地点，又可指很大很远的地方或场所。
指物体在其周围环境中所处的位置或状态，侧重地点或场所的环境特征。
一般特指戏剧或小说所写的环境或场所。
